review: The Ethiopian coffee ceremony was magical! Muluwork was an amazing host who shared so many interesting stories about Ethiopian coffee culture. The aroma and taste were incredible.
Learned so much about making injera! Kebede is a wonderful teacher and the food we made was delicious. Highly recommend this cooking experience.
Tigist is a master at basket weaving! It was fascinating to learn this traditional craft and I got to take home my own basket. Beautiful experience.
The music and dance session was so much fun! Dawit and his family are incredibly talented and made us feel so welcome. Learning eskista was a highlight of my trip!
Absolutely loved the coffee ceremony! Muluwork's knowledge and passion for Ethiopian coffee traditions really shines through. A must-do experience!
Hiwot's tea ceremony and storytelling was enchanting. She shared beautiful stories about Ethiopian history and culture. Very authentic and peaceful experience.
Great cooking class! Kebede made it easy to follow and the kitchen was well-equipped. Really enjoyed making traditional Ethiopian dishes.
This coffee ceremony exceeded all expectations! Muluwork is such a warm host and the coffee was the best I've ever tasted.
Really enjoyed learning to cook injera with Kebede. The techniques were fascinating and everything we made was delicious!
Beautiful tea ceremony experience. Hiwot is a wonderful storyteller and made us feel like part of the family. Loved every moment!
Kebede's cooking class was excellent! We learned to make several traditional dishes and the atmosphere was very welcoming.
The coffee ceremony was a perfect introduction to Ethiopian culture. Muluwork's hospitality was incredible and the coffee was amazing!
Tigist's basket weaving workshop was therapeutic and educational. I loved creating my own basket with traditional techniques!
Dawit's music and dance experience was unforgettable! The traditional instruments were beautiful and learning the dances was so much fun.
Fantastic cooking experience with Kebede. He's patient, knowledgeable, and the food was incredible. Best injera I've ever had!
Tigist is an amazing artisan! The basket weaving process was fascinating to learn and she shared wonderful stories about her craft.
Hiwot's tea ceremony was so peaceful and enriching. Her stories about Ethiopian traditions were captivating. Highly recommend!
Loved the coffee ceremony! Muluwork's home is beautiful and cozy. Learning about the three rounds of coffee was fascinating.
Beautiful tea ceremony and storytelling session. Hiwot is so knowledgeable and made us feel very welcome in her home.
Tigist's basket weaving class was wonderful! I appreciated learning about the cultural significance of the patterns we created.
The music and dance experience was incredible! Dawit's family is so talented and they made learning traditional dances fun and easy.
Muluwork's coffee ceremony was an authentic cultural experience. The coffee was delicious and I learned so much about Ethiopian traditions!
Hiwot's tea ceremony was a highlight of my trip. The atmosphere was so warm and the stories were fascinating.
Excellent cooking workshop! Kebede taught us so much about Ethiopian cuisine. Making injera from scratch was challenging but fun!
The coffee ceremony was wonderful! Muluwork is so passionate about sharing Ethiopian coffee culture. Would love to do it again!
Great experience learning to cook with Kebede. The step-by-step instructions were clear and the food was amazing!
Dawit's music and dance experience was so engaging! Learning to play traditional instruments was a unique experience.
The cooking class was good but I expected more hands-on time. Still learned a lot about Ethiopian cuisine.
Hiwot's tea ceremony was a wonderful cultural experience. Very authentic and peaceful. Loved the traditional tea preparation!
Muluwork's coffee ceremony was perfect! The setting was beautiful and she shared so many interesting facts about Ethiopian coffee.
Kebede is an excellent chef and teacher! The cooking class was informative and delicious. Learned authentic techniques.
The coffee ceremony was a beautiful cultural experience. Muluwork's hospitality made us feel like family. Highly recommend!
Great cooking workshop! Kebede made it fun and educational. The injera we made was delicious!
Hiwot's tea ceremony was lovely! The traditional setup and her stories about Ethiopian culture made it very special.
Good cooking class overall. Kebede is knowledgeable though the pace was a bit fast at times. Still enjoyed it!
Muluwork's coffee ceremony was an authentic Ethiopian experience! Loved learning about the ritual and the coffee was excellent.
Tigist's basket weaving workshop was meditative and fun! She's very patient and the studio has a great creative atmosphere.
Kebede's cooking class was enjoyable. Learned good techniques though would have liked more time for practice.
Dawit's music and dance session was energetic and fun! His family is so welcoming and the traditional music was beautiful.
The coffee ceremony with Muluwork was absolutely wonderful! A genuine cultural experience in a warm, welcoming setting.
Hiwot's tea ceremony and storytelling was magical. She has such a gift for sharing Ethiopian culture. Unforgettable experience!
Good coffee ceremony experience. Muluwork is knowledgeable and friendly. Would recommend to anyone visiting Addis Ababa.
Dawit's music and dance experience was great! The family made us feel welcome and the traditional performances were amazing.
Muluwork's coffee ceremony was a highlight of my Ethiopia trip! So authentic and her passion for coffee culture is inspiring.
Hiwot's tea ceremony was a peaceful and enriching experience. Loved hearing stories about Ethiopian traditions and history.
Kebede's cooking class was very informative. The injera-making process was fascinating and everything tasted great!
